Sun, 28 Jan 2024 03:51:55 +0000 State Highway 73 is closed east of the intersection with Lake Brunner Rd and diversions are in place at the scene.
People evacuated after chemical leak at Wellington’s Victoria University science lab, large scale emergency response https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-attend-strange-smells-at-victoria-university-in-wellington/BPYKCHYHFJBPNJWDXGXOG6OTJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-attend-strange-smells-at-victoria-university-in-wellington/BPYKCHYHFJBPNJWDXGXOG6OTJA/ Five fire appliances are at the university, including crew in Hazmat gear. Virtual reality: Tauranga City Council utilising VR tech to warn residents of disaster risk https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/virtual-reality-tauranga-city-council-utilising-vr-tech-to-warn-residents-of-disaster-risk/JOYLHAQECVHWPH73VWJGWQDCSA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/virtual-reality-tauranga-city-council-utilising-vr-tech-to-warn-residents-of-disaster-risk/JOYLHAQECVHWPH73VWJGWQDCSA/ A Tauranga council adviser says people find the experience immersive and surprising. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 03:03:52 +0000 Seeing, feeling and hearing a tsunami or earthquake unfold, in virtual reality, could help drive home the need for disaster preparedness, Tauranga City Council is hoping. Photo / Tauranga City Council
Woman dragged into Tamatea park in Napier and assaulted https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/crime-woman-dragged-into-napier-park-and-assaulted/54Y5B64BLZCV7PVKLKDT3BAC6E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/crime-woman-dragged-into-napier-park-and-assaulted/54Y5B64BLZCV7PVKLKDT3BAC6E/ The incident happened in Greenmeadows after dark on Saturday. Sun, 28 Jan 2024 02:53:33 +0000 A woman walking her dog was dragged across a road by a passing motorist who tried to indecently assault her at a Tamatea's Anderson Park on Saturday night. Photo / Connull Lang

One Love 2024: Wet weather hasn’t stop good vibes at reggae festival https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/one-love-2024-wet-weather-hasnt-stop-good-vibes-at-reggae-festival/X4EB7PM6UNA7FPFWJGQ6NJKS3E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/one-love-2024-wet-weather-hasnt-stop-good-vibes-at-reggae-festival/X4EB7PM6UNA7FPFWJGQ6NJKS3E/ Maryana Garcia“We’re all here for the same reason. It’s all about the music and everyone was excited." Photo / Maryana Garcia
